start.text: You wake up in an ancient, overgrown city. The air is thick with mystery and danger. You have two choices:
options: Explore the crumbling buildings to uncover the city's secrets.
Search for a way to escape the city and return home.

explore.text: As you delve deeper into the city's heart, you discover a hidden chamber. Inside, a mystical artifact awaits. Your choices:
options: Touch the artifact and unlock its power.
Leave the artifact untouched and continue exploring.

unlock_power.text: The artifact imbues you with incredible abilities, but it comes at a price. Your choices:
options: Embrace the power and become the guardian of the city.
Reject the power and seek a way to destroy the artifact.

destroy_artifact.text: You discover a ritual that can destroy the artifact. Performing it will require a dangerous journey. Your choices:
options: Gather allies and embark on the perilous journey.
Abandon the quest and accept the consequences of the artifact's power.

end_guardian.text: You become the guardian of the lost city, using your powers to protect it from those who seek to misuse it. Your story continues...

end_destroy.text: You successfully destroy the artifact, saving the world from its dangerous influence. Your story continues...
